course_description: Pre-reqs: QTM 110, 120, 210. Open to QSS majors only. Permission required by Internship Director. Supervised participation in a quantitatively focused internship approved by the Institute. No more than 4 credit hours may count toward QSS major elective credit. 3.0 minimum GPA required.
